name: Ladybug Fruit FRENZY!
description:
Instructions: 
1. Click the new game option to start

2. Try to get as much fruits as you can and avoid the edges or the blue trails and make sure to reach it before the time ends or else it's game over!

3. If your stuck or trapped click the trash bin icon to clear off the blue trails 

Remember: You only have 3 of them so be careful!

Note: Every time you get a fruit, the timer resets back to 10 seconds.

This game is not a virus and I have proof:

https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/13528a2acb34642a19e6c5e1b8f7de571d69159c6ebe...
https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/ac2be86e86f931b4b9f4403e080992b9dfeeb5e7cd8cb8e82aa6864b166ab245?nocache=1

Android.PUA.DebugKey is false positive
